name: Rubble (Dustin.Chamberlain)
description:
Rubble is a first-person adventure RPG demo, consisting of 2 levels and a boss fight. Players gather weapons and spells to advance rooms and take on different types of enemies. The boss fight will put all of these weapons and spells to use. This game was made by 7 game development and animation students.

PROGRAMMERS
Dustin Chamberlain
Andre Giroux
Kevin DeCoverley

ARTISTS
Timmy Frost
Damien Arbuckle
Cansu Tanpolat
Jackie Lin
Victoria Budding
